info.author: Raptus AG
classifiers: Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
Introduction
============

Provides an archetypes validator for file and image fields to only
allow specific content types to be added.

Example
-------

::

    from Products.ContentTypeValidator.validator import ContentTypeValidator
    
      ...
    
    FileField('file',
        validators = (ContentTypeValidator(('audio/mpeg', 'audio/x-mp3', 'audio/x-mpeg', 'audio/mp3',))),
        widget = atapi.FileWidget(
            description = '',
            label=_(u'label_audio', default=u'Audio file'),
            show_content_type = False,),
    ),
    
      ...

History
=======

2.0b4 (2012-11-20)
------------------

* Added unittests
  [gbastien]

* Updated translations
  [gbastien]

2.0b3 (2010-10-24)
------------------

* Updated German and Français translation
  [macagua]

* Added Spanish translation
  [macagua]

* Added master template .pot file
  [macagua]

* Set zip_safe flag to False

2.0b2 - (2010-10-21)
--------------------

* Removed unused generic setup profile
* Added README

2.0b1 - (2010-10-20)
--------------------

* First public release

1.2 - (Unreleased)
------------------

* Fixed mimetype parsing in validator

1.1 - (Unreleased)
------------------

* Changes added / profiles added / version increase

1.0 - (Unreleased)
------------------

* Init Rls for plone3
